sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TB_S07_020DEPT010 ( COMPANY_CODE, ORGANIZATION_SEQ, ORGANIZATION_CODE, ORGANIZATION_NAME, HR_ORGANIZATION_TYPE_CODE, START_DATE, END_DATE, WORKS_CODE, ORGANIZATION_SORT_ORDER, PARENT_HR_ORGANIZATION_CODE, CREATED_OBJECT_TYPE, CREATED_OBJECT_ID, CREATED_PROGRAM_ID, CREATION_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATED_OBJECT_TYPE, LAST_UPDATED_OBJECT_ID, LAST_UPDATE_PROGRAM_ID, LAST_UPDATE_TIMESTAMP, ORGANIZATION_NAME_SHORT ) VALUES ( #COMPANY_CODE#, #ORGANIZATION_SEQ#, #ORGANIZATION_CODE#, #ORGANIZATION_NAME#, #HR_ORGANIZATION_TYPE_CODE#, #START_DATE#, #END_DATE#, #WORKS_CODE#, #ORGANIZATION_SORT_ORDER#, #PARENT_HR_ORGANIZATION_CODE#, #CREATED_OBJECT_TYPE#, #CREATED_OBJECT_ID#, #CREATED_PROGRAM_ID#, #CREATION_TIMESTAMP#, #LAST_UPDATED_OBJECT_TYPE#, #LAST_UPDATED_OBJECT_ID#, #LAST_UPDATE_PROGRAM_ID#, #LAST_UPDATE_TIMESTAMP#, #ORGANIZATION_NAME_SHORT# )
